title: Quality Scoring (Iteration 1)
description: Score the UI quality against design examples

verification.gridLayout: Verified - Two-column grid on xl screens
verification.header: Verified - Title, subtitle, Refresh and New Task buttons
verification.sidebar: Verified - Fixed sidebar with Alma Reports branding, Material Icons, active state working
verification.taskCards: Verified - White cards with indigo icon box, frequency badges (Daily green, Weekly blue), format badges, Run Task/Test buttons
verification.taskFormModal: Verified - Sectioned layout with BASIC INFO, OUTPUT SETTINGS, TESTING & DEBUGGING sections, proper icons, Delete Task/Cancel/Save buttons
